layout_structure: The screen features a fixed top app bar with a title and menu. Below the header is a wallet/points display. The main content consists of a 2-column grid for secondary actions (Redeem/Rate Us) followed by a vertically stacked list of large cards for primary quiz categories.

typography.heading_sizes: Large slab-serif/monospace for the app title and bold sans-serif for quiz categories.
typography.body_text_size: Small for subtitles and button labels.
typography.font_weights: Regular for subtitles, Bold for main headings and quiz titles.

spacing_and_density.padding: Consistent outer margins (approx 16dp). Cards have internal padding to separate icons from text.
spacing_and_density.element_spacing: Vertical spacing between cards is clear, creating distinct touch targets.

interactive_elements.action: Navigates to rewards or app store rating

visual_hierarchy: The eye flows from the bright cyan header to the wallet balance, then moves down the list of vibrant, colorful quiz category cards which serve as the primary call-to-actions.
accessibility_observations: White text on the light blue 'Rate Us' background may have low contrast.
The 'Beginner' and 'Redeem' labels are quite small relative to the screen size.
The wallet balance '27' in red may be hard to see for some colorblind users against the light background icons.
